variants.message: You enter a musky cave. There are two branches. At the end of one of them, you see a light. There is also some coal on the wall.

options.title: Mine the coal and move on

variants.message: You enter a naturally-lit cave. There is some iron on the side, but it is high up, there is a way back to the surface, and there is another branch that goes down deep.

options.title: Mine the iron but continue in the cave
Go down the deep and dark path

variants.message: You enter a cavern with a wall on one side that contains a doorway. There is also a hole in the center of the cavern. You spot some iron on the side.

options.title: Mine the iron and move on
